message:
السلام عليكم

من فضلكم يا شباب عندى مشكلة مع مشروع WPF مجننانى - البروجكت معمول net 4.6 والجهاز بتاع العميل عليه ويندوز 10 

كل في الحاجة في المشروع شغالة مع عدا عرض التقارير - انا بستخدم devexpress report وملفات dll بتاعتها كلها مع المشروع 

تظهر ليا شاشة الخطأ التالية عند عرض التقارير 

ولما اخترت Debug ظهرت ليا الرسالة دى:
---------------------------

Visual Studio Just-In-Time Debugger
---------------------------
An unhandled Microsoft .NET Framework exception occurred in Trusted_Trader.exe [4036]. Just-In-Time debugging this exception failed with the following error: The remote procedure call failed.

Check the documentation index for 'Just-in-time debugging, errors' for more information.

---------------------------
OK   
---------------------------
ممكن اعرف ايه حل المشكلة دى وايه سببها ؟

data.message: Just wanted to point out that this screenshot is completely useless, it's the message you get when any application in windows crashes.
طيب انا ممكن أوصل للسبب ازاى يعنى اعمل ايه ؟
Please check the windows event logs it may help you finding out the reason of this issue also you can use a fresh virtual machine in order to reproduce the crash on ur environment

دول الملفين بتوع Windows Evnet

http://www.mediafire.com/download/d6akdkim0epdq62/net+err.txt

http://www.mediafire.com/download/pchyz4u0ddvhp53/App+Err.txt

ياريت حد يقدر يحل المشكلة يا شباب الله يكرمكم

There are hundreds even thousands of reasons why a program crashes, neither the screenshot nor the fact that the client has .net 4.6 are enough, you need the actual exception, put some logging or exception handling in your code and run again, don't guess.
The reason may be completely different like a missing DLL or something, you need data
Try install devexpress package on one of the virtual machines. Seems to be a missing file that devexpress reports depends on.
Do you invoke any web services at displaying reports?
